name: huntarr
tagline: A self-hosted request manager for movies and shows in media libraries
description: Huntarr.io is a self hosted request management tool for media libraries. It allows users to request movies or shows and integrates with automation tools like Radarr and Sonarr to streamline adding content to your servers.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Allow users to request movies and TV shows for your media library

features.title: User Interface
features.description: Clean, intuitive interface for browsing and requesting content

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search for content using TMDb or TVDb databases

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Track all requests with status updates and completion notifications

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Manage requests from multiple users with individual accounts
